name: Spin Tops Vs Spin Fidget
description:
Fidget Spinner Vs Beyblade is a NEW game inspire from fidget spinner and Beyblade. There's one simple rule... YOU SPIN! YOU WIN!

Fidget Spinner Vs Beyblade is the awesome new action game featuring Fidget Spinners! Switch to spin faster, collide with other spinners to take their RPMs, and become the fastest, fidgetiest player in the world!

Battle lots of Beyblade tops in this immersive spinner arena game. Defeat all of your opponents to become the best player.
